data.actual_result: The notification has the sender as **Discord** even if the search shows that the message was by the user who joined.
data.expected_result: The notification should have the username of the member who has joined.
data.short_description: The default welcome messages by Discord when searched, are apparently the message of the user who has joined but the notification shows the message was sent by Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set the notification settings of a server to all messages. - Close Discord app(don't kill it) - Ask a member to join the server. - Check the notification (it says the message was sent by Discord). - Go to the server where the member has joined. - Search the messages sent by the use.
